sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../services/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours.js"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating.js"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); // desctruture properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} ₹ {price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
List
); }; export default TourDetails;
